General.Name: Shengyuan Environmental Protection
General.Description: Shengyuan Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd. engages in the domestic waste incineration power generation and sewage treatment in China. The company is involved in the collection, transportation, and terminal treatment systems. It operates 5 domestic sewage treatment plants; 1 living garbage leachate treatment station; and 13 waste incineration power plants. Shengyuan Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, China.
